alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hillsborough; Inland Hillsborough; Pinellas (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 23 at 3:04PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Pinellas and central Hillsborough Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 304 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Tampa International Airport, or near Tampa, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tampa, Clearwater, Largo, Pinellas Park, Temple Terrace, St. Petersburg, South Highpoint, Palm River-Clair Mel, Tampa International Airport, Macdill Air Force Base, East Lake-Orient Park, Gandy, Egypt Lake-Leto, Feather Sound, West And East Lealman, Riverview, Greater Carrollwood, Citrus Park, Safety Harbor and West Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
